name: Insamani
description:
Concept: The human mind is a maze, which is taken literally in this game, bad thoughts are like ghosts that can haunt you after every dicision, here you play a depressed character trapped inside his mind, searching for a way out while looking out for the negative thoughts that dwell in the hallways of the maze that is the mind.

Lots of features yet to come.

It's not quite done but i had to deliver, I didnt make the most of the time i had, I will work on it further.
